cooksNumber.label: Cook's Number
cooksNumber.description: Affects the calculation of turnaround time. If not specified, the time specified in the products plus the time to the pickup point will be used.

maxSimultaneousOrders.label: Maximum number of single-site orders
maxSimultaneousOrders.description: If not specified, the number of simultaneous orders is not limited.

acceptOrders.label: Accept orders:
acceptOrders.description: If not specified, your products will not appear in the search.
